channel.title: Sports

item.description: Get the latest NFL playoff picture as Sunday's Week 15 games develop.

item.title: Super Bowl 2026 Odds: Rams, Seahawks Remain Atop Board; Broncos Rise
item.description: Will the next Super Bowl champion come from the NFC West? And how far did Denver rise with its 11th straight win? Here's the latest.

item.title: 4 Takeaways From the Vikings' Win Over the Cowboys
item.description: The Cowboys dropped a second straight game against the Vikings on Sunday night. Here are the takeaways.

item.title: NFL Week 15 Team of the Week: Trevor Lawrence and Puka Nacua Headline Best Games
item.description: Trevor Lawrence made history while scoring six touchdowns to headline the NFL Week 15 Team of the Week.

item.title: Source: Pack's Parsons believed to have torn ACL
item.description: The initial belief is that the Packers' Micah Parsons suffered a torn ACL, a source confirmed to ESPN.

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United ready to make January move for Semenyo
item.description: Bournemouth winger Antoine Semenyo is being lined up for a January move to Manchester United. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

item.title: Way-too-early 2026 Heisman watch: 15 players who could win the award
item.description: We size up next year's most likely candidates for college football's highest individual honor.

item.title: Mahomes tears ACL as Chiefs' playoff hopes end
